statements: SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role != 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'user' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT user_id, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT user_id, role FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC, user_id DESC
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT username, role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS total_roles FROM users LEFT JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id GROUP BY username;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.role_id WHERE r.role_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, session_token FROM sessions WHERE user_id = 7;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%' OR username LIKE '%root%';
SELECT roles.role_name, users.username FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT * FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE roles.role_name = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, session_token FROM users JOIN sessions ON users.user_id = sessions.user_id WHERE session_token IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, email, username FROM Users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM Roles WHERE role_name = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT role_name, count(user_id) as num_users FROM Roles JOIN UserRoles ON Roles.role_id = UserRoles.role_id GROUP BY role_name;
SELECT Users.username, Sessions.expiration_time FROM Users JOIN Sessions ON Users.user_id = Sessions.user_id WHERE Sessions.expiration_time > NOW();
